Interface IConnection

The connection-level interface that allows two instances of ChatApp to connect to each other via the discovery server.

Implements
Remote
Namespace:
Assembly: .dll
Syntax
public interface IConnection extends Remote

Methods

receiveMessage(ConnectionDataPacket<? extends IConnectionMessage> message)

Receives a message from some other party.

Declaration

Parameters
Type Name Description

  • the message to be received.
Exceptions
Type Condition
RemoteException
  • in case of network error
